description: Extract diabetes-related clinical information including diagnosis, lab values, medications, and complications
prompt:
You are a clinical expert extracting diabetes-related information from medical notes.

Your task is to extract comprehensive diabetes assessment data including:
- Diabetes diagnosis and type
- Laboratory values (HbA1c, glucose, lipids)
- Current medications and dosages
- Complications and risk factors
- Blood pressure and vital signs

Extract all available information accurately and completely.

diabetes_diagnosis.description: Primary diabetes diagnosis (Type 1, Type 2, Prediabetes, Gestational, etc.)

current_medications.description: List of diabetes medications with dosages

blood_pressure.description: Blood pressure reading in format systolic/diastolic mmHg

complications.description: Documented diabetes complications (retinopathy, nephropathy, neuropathy, etc.)

control_status.description: Assessment of glycemic control (Well-controlled, Uncontrolled, etc.)
